thread.title: Anthony Martial believes United can win a double this year
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial believes United can win a double this year

author: paulmbanks
title: Anthony Martial believes United can win a double this year
text:
Tweet 
19-year-old Anthony Martial was reportedly a target of both Arsenal and Tottenham Hotspur before Manchester United signed him for £36 million on deadline day. Since coming over from Monaco, the expensive teenager has been a God-send for the Red Devils, providing the spark plug that the offense badly needed. 
With a dream start to his Old Trafford career, he’s been worth every penny thus far. Now Anthony Martial is dreaming bigger for United. 
Anthony Martial, who made his first ever start for France tonight (here’s the video highlights), told French TV show Telefoot: 
“I think we can win the Premier League and the Champions League this season. Both of them. We are among the top five clubs (in Europe).” 
Yes, Martial believes he can help lead United to a double this season! He also assessed the state of his United career thus far. 
“It is going well so far. I have had a great welcome from the fans. I don’t think about my price on the pitch.” 
“The goal against Liverpool, the big enemy of the club, allowed the fans to get to know me a bit better.” 
Anthony Martial and his United teammates return to league action on Saturday versus Everton.
